description: Make bluebird work with the continuation-local-storage module.
name: cls-bluebird

scripts.cover-main: COVERAGE=true BLUEBIRD_VERSION=3 istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec 'test/**/*.test.js'
scripts.coveralls: npm run cover-main && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.test: npm run jshint && npm run test-all
scripts.test-all: npm run test-bluebird2 && npm run test-bluebird3
